info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 7:39AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Patchy Freezing Drizzle Possible This Morning... Patchy freezing drizzle has been reported over portions of the St Lawrence valley and northern Adirondacks this morning. Any areas where temperatures have been below freezing overnight may see some slick surfaces this morning. Remember, it only takes a glaze of ice to create hazardous driving conditions. Precautionary/Preparedness Actions... Freezing drizzle may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extra caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.
